Name: Andra Underground Mines Postcard
Description: Deep within the Andra Basin tunnels—where the Byrnhald's Giant Golem was destroyed during the Asterleeds Independence War—its abandoned energy core continues to trigger dramatic ecological transformations.
Description$english: Deep within the Andra Basin tunnels—where the Byrnhald's Giant Golem was destroyed during the Asterleeds Independence War—its abandoned energy core continues to trigger dramatic ecological transformations.
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
